text: Hi there, just wondering if there is a way to get the blog listing to display/order when the blog was first created and not published? Some blogs have been updated with new tags but for some reason it has changed the publish date as well so older blogs have been pulled through to this month.
found this article that helped solve it <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Order-blog-posts-on-listing-page-by-quot-Created-Date-quot/td-p/389230>
